entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Today we flew the first shipment of COVID-19 vaccines to Hong Kong. We are proud to do our part in the fight against the pandemic and we stand ready to undertake future shipments to Hong Kong and the rest of the world using our dedicated vaccine distribution solution.
#MoveBeyond https://t.co/N7a0Ri9JMH
@WGshaun Hi there, you can purchase our 12 Miniature Soft Toys via https://t.co/BD61qiWt5A

@suntuenmun We could only tell if the ticket is open or not but we couldn't check for refund status. You are always welcome to send us DM to check for ticket status. However, if you wish to check for refund status, only the travel agent could help.  -Vinci
@GautierPelegrin Hi there, please send us DM with your eTicket number and passenger’s full name for checking.
@suntuenmun Hi Bill, sorry that we are unable to check the refund status on behalf of travel agent. Please check with them directly for the most updated status.

data.text:
As the sun enters ♒ #Aquarius, here’s a little quiz to see if you travel just like one. Itineraries may not be written in the stars, but perhaps they can inspire your next big adventures!

📸: IG@ty_sheers_photography https://t.co/palMk9XIz8
@UnholyMogWomp Unfortunately that we do not operate to JNB. Flight schedule is always subject to change. -Vinci
@eminlondon10 I'm afraid that you may have to contact the baggage team for follow-up. -Vinci

We may be socially distanced, but there are still ways to show our love to one another. Here are four greeting cards 💌 to send to your loved ones and wish them a Happy Valentine’s Day! Which is your favourite? https://t.co/FxCWCLQH7q

data.text: @eminlondon10 You may contact our baggage team to follow-up on the baggage. Their contact info can be found on https://t.co/pfiIwsDxyL -Vinci
@eminlondon10 Sorry to hear this, may we advise you to refer to airport team's update. -Vinci
@HelenMHogan1 Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly

@moneoli Hi there, sorry that our passenger flight from TLV to HKG has been suspended until further notice. 
You may always check here for our latest flight timetable: https://t.co/NsGs8pvVB7 -Liz
@charmianhughes Sorry to hear this. Do you mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can look into it? -Vinci

data.text:
As we welcome the Year of the Ox, we look forward to new beginnings and the promise of new possibilities. For us, this means taking off with you once again. Happy Lunar New Year, from all of us at Cathay Pacific.
#MoveBeyond https://t.co/V7zWJbOPzN

urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

data.text: @ibarra1213 It depends on the final destination's requirement. You may refer to https://t.co/NjjXgdMMKs for the latest requirement. -Vinci
@KishanD07 Soeet we do not operate between BOM and BKK. -Vinci

@jkeltgv Hi there, as we are unable to check the refund process for ticket issued through a third party, please advise your agent to contact agency sales team or helpdesk if they are facing difficulties regarding your case - they will know how to work on it.
 -Ella

5/5 If you have received an email you think is suspicious, please do not click on any links contained within them or supply any personal information, including credit card details that could be used to identify you.
Learn More: https://t.co/No5gyHkgDE

4/5  If you would like to make changes to your booking and you booked through Cathay Pacific, visit https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ. If you purchased your ticket through a third party, please contact them directly to organise your change.
3/5  Please note that we will not ask customers to reveal personal information, such as passwords, credit card numbers and account information via email.
2/5  We believe that scammers are attempting to deceive customers into providing sensitive information through their participation in fraudulent forms.

data.text: Reducing single use plastics when travelling is one easy step everyone can take towards sustainable travel. From water bottles for hydration to cloth bags for shopping, what have you done to make travel in the new normal more environmentally friendly? https://t.co/eEA7ISsexl

data.text:
Plane windows are an iconic frame for your views from the top, but have you ever wondered why they’re round? That’s because round cutouts in the fuselage – the main body of the aircraft – are stronger than square ones, which helps reduce fatigue!

📸: IG@notatravelbloggr https://t.co/Mq7dO9cxVp
@tonyng42 Unfortunately that it opens at 0530am. You may refer to https://t.co/S39NFQU7hJ for more details. -Vinci

@tonyng42 Sorry that our lounge opens until the last flight departure time only. 
-Vinci

data.text:
From skating ⛸ on frozen lakes to bathing in hot springs ♨, what do you love most about #winter travel? Perhaps hiking in snowy Sobaeksan 🗻 in Danyang County, South Korea and admiring the snow-covered roofs of Guinsa nestled in its valleys.

📸: IG@namchosun_landscapes https://t.co/tJ0u08iE6Q

data.text: @viewthroughjen1 @Expedia If ticket is purchased with third party, we're afraid that airline is unable to intervene and the issuing agent will have to take care of refund directly at their end. -Vinci
@kerry_perkins Hi there, in case your flight is cancelled by us, we will protect you to the next available flight. Thank you.- Liz

Welcome to the Cathay Fan Guided Tour 2021! Every month, a fan will share a secret hangout in their hometown. We'd love to hear from you! Let’s start our journey on the eastern end of Hong Kong at Tin Ha Shan, a go-to spot for locals to watch the sun rise.

📸: IG@shine.with.mi https://t.co/aGzdQkryW3

This year has made us more appreciative of travel than ever. As we welcome 2021 with renewed optimism, we have 7 little things we are most thankful for about flying. Can you find them all? https://t.co/8gCHHiXUSz
@joostde99 Hi there, we are unable to contact passenger directly. Please send us PM with below link, thank you. https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
The latest compulsory quarantine requirements for all passengers to Hong Kong were updated. Please refer to HKSAR Government's website - https://t.co/rWXE25wS5v for details. https://t.co/Objk8ZxLJ4
@writejmh May I know the details of your concern in DM so we can direct you to the right channel? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ulfw You may have to check with the first operating carrier to see what is their luggage check through policy. -Vinci

We can’t wait to fly you to your loved ones again.

data.text:
Welcome aboard the flight to everywhere! Why restrict ourselves to nowhere when we can go around the earth at the speed of the Internet? Look out of the window. Can you guess the destinations we’re flying by?
 
📸: IG@itsbernie81, xd_alexey, seelautravel https://t.co/4TvzjLk6Pk
@IMRajneeshPatel Mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

☕ or 🍵?
There comes a time in a flight when you will be asked this question. If you answer tea, put the luscious tea plantations of #Uji on your list. Located between Kyoto and Nara, the name Uji is regarded in #Japan as the benchmark of high quality tea leaf!

📸@horiimiho29 https://t.co/Eo0nUI0oXu

data.text:
Located near #Incheon Airport, Paradise City is an art-tainment venue with striking architecture, most recognisably Club Chroma. Its facade is inspired by the idea of a melting golden sun. What memorable buildings have you encountered in your travels?
 
📸: IG@ployslittleatlas https://t.co/jr46yl1Tsu
@Else8d1 For details, please check with your bank. Thanks for your understanding. (2/2) - Liz

@Else8d1 Sorry that the currency cannot be changed. Your credit card will be charged the currency of the fare quoted. Credit card-issuing banks may charge you an international transaction fee, depending on the country of departure and credit card's currency. (1/2) - Liz
@mkellerm Hi there. Sorry to hear your disappointment. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@prabhde05550496 There is not any flight to Australia until next year. - Chloe
@wong_natha Hi Nathaniel, we are so glad to hear about that!! We will pass to related team and thank you for letting us know:)  Hope to see you again in the future! - Anna

data.text:
Considered one of the six holiest places to worship in #Bali, Pura Penataran Agung Lempuyang is famed for its Gates of Heaven with a majestic mountain as its background. Do you know the name of this mountain?

📸: IG@jordhammond https://t.co/l7aqdpjfs2

When flying, pilots use position lights to determine the direction of travel of other aircraft. These green and red position lights are to differentiate the left and the right wings. Can you guess where the green light goes? https://t.co/ZumVBYBLkd

@Else8d1 We can only check/ modify booking that issued with us directly. For booking not issued with us, we are unable to check the terms and conditions. If you would like to book via third party website, please check with them directly for the terms. -Joy

@Else8d1 Hi there. This policy applicable to  all tickets originally purchased and issued between 9 March and 31 December 2020. For tickets that were purchased through third parties, please contact your issuing agent directly for rebooking/ refund. Thank you. 
- Liz

data.text: We expect to operate very busy flights from the United Kingdom to Hong Kong. Please arrive at the airport at least 4 hours before departure. From all of us at Cathay Pacific Europe, we look forward to welcoming you on board and wish you a safe and pleasant trip home.

data.text:
Enter Katsuoji Temple in #Osaka and you'll likely be greeted by Daruma dolls everywhere. These iconic red dolls, which are said to bring good luck, are also commonly sold as souvenirs. What are some of your favourite souvenirs from your travels?

📸: IG@chopsticksontheloose https://t.co/JJk5Kn8fe7
@JRD_75 Can you DM us the full itinerary and preferred travel date? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@JRD_75 We do have flights to MEL but they are fully booked until Apr2021. -Vinci

data.text: @PetchAj Our finance team will check each booking in details and calculate the refundable amount before contact the relevant bank for the refund, therefore the refund process takes a longer time. Thanks for your patience. - Liz

@PetchAj Hi there, sorry for the flight cancellation. As team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual, up to 6 weeks.  The team will return the amount asap.  We appreciate your patience. - Liz
@the_cleof Hi there, sorry to inform you that flights to South Africa are suspended until April. -Joy
